title: AS LONG AS THERE IS BREATH IN YOUR BODY - Powerful Motivational Speech
itunes:title: AS LONG AS THERE IS BREATH IN YOUR BODY - Powerful Motivational Speech
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
As long as there is breath in your body and you are still breathing, you still have a shot. One of the BEST Motivational Speeches featuring Walter Bond, Coach Pain, Marcus A Taylor and more!
